title: Javid defends 'swift action' on Omicron variant
content: The health secretary says mask rules and travel tests will help to protect Christmas celebrations.

title: Javid defends 'swift action' on Omicron variant
content: The health secretary says mask rules and travel tests will help to protect Christmas celebrations.

title: Lack of action will see more Channel deaths - Patel
content: Her remarks comes as Europe ministers meet to discuss migrant crisis without the UK home secretary.

title: Dorries criticised for doubting PM dad grope claim
content: MP Caroline Nokes says she is disappointed after the culture secretary dismisses her Stanley Johnson claim.

title: Has Sturgeon delivered on her conference pledges?
content: The SNP leader has made lots of policy pledges in her conference speeches - but have they been delivered on?

title: PM under pressure to act on migrant sea crossings
content: Lives remain at risk, but as the crisis persists, the greater the political risks for the PM too.

title: Whitty: Public would need to back more Covid curbs
content: England's chief medical officer wonders if "we could take people with us" if new restrictions are imposed.

title: Northern Ireland bridge scrapped over £335bn cost
content: The cost could not be justified in a UK transport review but improvements to the A1, A75 and A77 were recommended.
